code: import brasil from'../imgs/brasil.png';import eua from'../imgs/eua.png';import'./chooseLang.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ChooseLanguage(setLanguage){function handleSetLanguageToEN(){exitAnimation();setLanguage.setLanguage('english');}function handleSetLanguageToPT(){setLanguage.setLanguage('portuguese');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"chooseLanguagePage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"chooseLanguageGroup",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"textDivRow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Choose Your Language."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"imagesDivRow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSetLanguageToPT,id:"portugueseLanguage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{width:171,height:106,src:brasil,alt:"Portuguese"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSetLanguageToEN,id:"englishLanguage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{width:171,height:106,src:eua,alt:"English"})})]})]})});}function exitAnimation(){var target=document.querySelector('#chooseLanguagePage');target.style.animation="pageExit 3s";}
